Reflection: Obvious need in the field - so far I have attended Winter Schools "Ethics in Neuroscience" and "Fairness in AI" - looking forward to learning more in this wide overlapping area
Questions: So far more questions than answers :)
Feedback: The organisation of the course seemed a bit complicated; but I am glad that effort was put into detailed conceptual and procedural planning

Reflection: It is a good idea to put people of different levels of experience together; it just felt that the threshold for "experience" vs. "inexperience" was somewhat arbitrary/based on the individual self-evaluation - i. e. all females in the curse considered that they are inexperienced in DS - I wonder if it could be correlated with different self-evaluation tendencies of males vs. females
I was sceptical at first; but it actually feels validating
Feedback: I am glad it is an individual and not a group exercise
